author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter mixing valve waterproofing tip…I using mixing valve seals on every project. This protects the exposed edge of my KERDI-BOARD from water and water vapor. It also redirects any water or moisture that gets behind the tile or shower valve trim. Many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this tutorial 🔥#showerremodel #schlutersystems #bathroomremodel #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Schluter Mixing Valve Waterproofing Tip - #shorts #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
